name: Souls-Like Game
description:
Created a souls-like project which implements all the major features seen in the Dark-Souls and Bloodborne games. This is just a prototype/demo and not a full game. It may have a few bugs here and there. You can press U to restart the game if you are stuck.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Click -  Light Attack

Right Click - Heavy Attack

F - Health Potion

Tab - Target Lock Enemy

Q/E - Cycle Enemy Target Lock

Space - Dash/Roll

Heavy attack when behind an enemy to ambush attack

Alt-Enter to change window size
